user_query: I want to know the details of the trading pair with the pair slug 'ETH-USDC' on the Sushiswap exchange. Also, provide me with the trade data for the same pair for the latest hour.

TaskList.description: Retrieve the details of the trading pair 'ETH-USDC' from the Sushiswap exchange.
Fetch the trade data for the 'ETH-USDC' pair for the latest hour.
